segments.text: I observe the scene in this kitchen drawing with a sense of impending worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is polishing that plate so meticulously, but the sink is flooding behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking to think about the water damage that's going to ruin everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the puddle, yet she doesn't react at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies, which might seem fun, but the stool is tilting dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If the boy slips on the wet floor after climbing down, it could be awful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so eager, but this mischief could end in tears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is open wide, tempting them into trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked nearby, ready to crash if anything goes wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden view outside only highlights the sadness of the ignored hazards inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a deep pity for what might happen to this family moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just a drawing, but it evokes such a melancholic feeling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No one seems to notice the building problems, and that's truly depressing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The apron on the woman reminds me of simpler times, now at risk.
segments.speaker: PAR
